Hymn.Arabic: أَعْطَيْتَ الَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَكَ عَلَامَةً ؛ لِيَهْرُبُوا مِنْ وَجْهِ القَوْسِ ،
Hymn.English: 4 You have given a banner to those who fear You, That it may be displayed because of the truth.

Hymn.Arabic: لِكَيمَا يَنْجُوَ أحِبَّاؤُكَ. خَلِصْنِي بِيَمِينِكَ. هَلِّلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 5 That Your beloved may be delivered, Save with Your right hand.
